segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is a mess waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink overflowing like that, water sloshing everywhere— gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the cabinets and floor; who wants to mop that up?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot in the puddle, completely unaware— how oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, filthy hands in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that grimy stool, stretching like it's stable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies will probably end up on the wet floor soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, just inviting more chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so sloppy and irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the garden outside looks too tidy for this indoor sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing dishes stacked while water ruins everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of neglect makes my skin crawl.
segments.speaker: PAR
